summary.para: Query if the format converter can convert from one format to another.

param.name: pSrcPixelFormats
param.para: An array of WIC pixel formats that represents source image planes.

param.name: cSrcPlanes
param.para: The number of source pixel formats specified by the pSrcFormats parameter.

param.name: pfCanConvert
param.para: True if the conversion is supported.

returns.para: If the conversion is not supported, this method returns S_OK, but *pfCanConvert is set to FALSE.
If this method fails, the out parameter pfCanConvert is invalid.

remarks.para: To specify an interleaved input pixel format, provide a length 1 array to pSrcPixelFormats.

summary.para: Initializes a format converter with a planar source, and specifies the interleaved output pixel format.

param.name: ppPlanes
param.para: An array of that represents image planes.

param.name: cPlanes
param.para: The number of component planes specified by the planes parameter.

param.name: pIPalette
param.para: The palette to use for conversion.

param.name: alphaThresholdPercent
param.para: The alpha threshold to use for conversion.

param.name: paletteTranslate
param.para: The palette translation type to use for conversion.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
